about.meta.title: The Vision
about.hero.subtitle: Private Consulting
about.manifesto.quote_part1: The true art of real estate mediation lies not in the transaction, but in the
about.manifesto.text: In a world driven by speed, I choose rigor. My commitment transcends closing deals; I focus on designing strategies that endure. I believe every real estate asset should serve a greater purpose: the security of your investment and your family's legacy.
about.bio.label: The Journey
about.bio.title: From Private Banking to Exclusive Consulting.
about.bio.p1: My name is Marco Moura. Before entering the real estate sector, I built a solid career in asset management, where I learned that numbers tell stories. This analytical background allows me today to look at a property not just as "space", but as a living financial asset.
about.bio.p2: I specialize in managing High Net Worth clients, where discretion and efficiency are not differentiators, they are absolute prerequisites. My work begins long before the visit and ends long after the deed.
about.bio.p3: I accompany Golden Visa processes, tax structuring (NHR), and family relocation to Portugal, acting as your sole trusted point of contact.
about.values.1_desc: Trust takes years to build and seconds to lose. I base my conduct on absolute transparency. If a deal is not advantageous for your portfolio, I will be the first to advise against it.
about.values.2_desc: I don't sell intuition; I sell data. My recommendations are based on comparative market analysis, real Yields, and grounded projections of future appreciation.
about.values.3_desc: I understand the sensitive nature of large capital movements. I guarantee total secrecy at all stages of the process, protecting your identity and your business interests.
about.cta.subtitle: Shall we discuss the future of your real estate portfolio?

legal.consent_banner.text: At Porthouse Private Office, your privacy is an asset. We use cookies to ensure security and personalize your experience. By browsing, you accept our
legal.modal.title: Legal & Compliance
legal.privacy.intro: Porthouse Private Office, with offices at Avenida da Liberdade, Lisbon, Portugal, is the entity responsible for the domain porthouserealestate.com.
legal.privacy.commitment: WE ARE COMMITTED TO PROTECTING THE PRIVACY AND PERSONAL DATA OF OUR CLIENTS AND INVESTORS, IN STRICT COMPLIANCE WITH GDPR.
legal.privacy.scope_text: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect and process the personal data necessary for the provision of luxury real estate consulting and asset management services.
legal.privacy.data_text: The personal data collected (name, email, phone, investment preferences) is exclusively for:
legal.privacy.data_list_1: Management of consulting requests and scheduling of private meetings;
legal.privacy.data_list_2: Pre-contractual and contractual due diligence within the scope of real estate mediation;
legal.privacy.data_list_3: Compliance with legal obligations (e.g., identification of beneficial owners - Law 83/2017);
legal.privacy.data_list_4: Communication of investment opportunities (only with explicit consent).
legal.privacy.security_text: We implement robust security protocols to protect your information. We do not sell your data. Sharing with third parties (lawyers, notaries, banks) occurs only when strictly necessary for the completion of real estate deals and always under a duty of confidentiality.
legal.privacy.rights_text: You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, deletion, or opposition to processing by directly contacting our Data Protection Officer at: private@porthouserealestate.com.
legal.cookies.title: Cookies Policy
legal.cookies.intro: We use cookies to optimize your browsing experience and ensure platform security.
legal.cookies.cat_1: Strictly Necessary: Essential for the site's operation (e.g., session management, CSRF security). Cannot be turned off.
legal.cookies.cat_2: Analytical: Collect anonymous traffic data (e.g., most visited pages) to help us improve the service.
legal.cookies.manage: You can manage your cookie preferences directly in your browser settings.
legal.ral.title: Alternative Dispute Resolution (RAL)
legal.ral.text: Under Law No. 144/2015, of September 8, we inform that in the event of a consumer dispute, the client may resort to an Alternative Consumer Dispute Resolution Entity.
legal.ral.entity_name: National Center for Information and Arbitration of Consumer Conflicts
legal.ral.more_info: For more information, please visit the Consumer Portal: www.consumidor.gov.pt.
